name: Flan
description:
Operate two people at the same time! ? An action game that thinks of each other!When the girl woke up, a dark and cold place had spread.

As the girl advances her feet, she meets the frozen black knight.
Join the power of two people and get to the truth!

Fantastic world view and beautiful 3D graphics, such as a picture book
Then inspire your imagination, and enjoy it with a beautiful sound that you will unintentionally hear.
Enjoy from beginners to core users
I'm finished with the game balance.Action game beginners can also play easily and fun!・ The operation is only 4 left stick, right stick, L trigger, R trigger!

・ Even if done, you can start over from that stage right away!

・ It is a game that you can play without reading the characters!

・ Because there are collecting elements, there is also an insertion element after clearing!

Trial version is
You can download it on the official website.
